Name: Khitmah
description: Khitmah is a 52-year-old married woman. Her brothers have apiaries in Irbid where they produce honey to sell. To make additional income for the family, Khitmah  chose to buy honey from her brothers at wholesale prices and sell them back in Zarqa, where she lives, at market prices. Being a "people person" she was able to promote her small home business. Now Khitmah is applying for a loan to increase her order of honey, and begin selling other food such as dairy products.
